title: Has social media contributed to political polarization? If so, what changes do you think could curb this? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s very easy for small groups of extremists (or hired organisations) to create many fake accounts and spread much “noise” of a polarised nature, so yes. To fight this more measures against this should be taken. The following could be a start: Check more actively for fake accountsDefine more clear rules about truth and non-discrimination and setup a good moderation approach for thisFind a way to involve the social media users in this effort
